summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue local improvement bonds for the improvement of Holmes Street, in Street and Summit Avenue, now in too, formerly in the City of Columbia, under Ordinance No. 28 of the former City of Columbia, creating Local Improvement District No. 7, of the former City of Columbia; prescribing the rate of interest thereon, and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
